component.name: customers.customerManagerLinks.moveManagerLink
component.description: Moves a client customer to a new manager customer. This simplifies the complex request that requires two operations to move a client customer to a new manager, for example: 1. Update operation with Status INACTIVE (previous manager) and, 2. Update operation with Status ACTIVE (new manager).

component.name: customers.experimentArms.mutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes experiment arms. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: customers.experiments.endExperiment
component.description: Immediately ends an experiment, changing the experiment's scheduled end date and without waiting for end of day. End date is updated to be the time of the request.

component.name: customers.experiments.graduateExperiment
component.description: Graduates an experiment to a full campaign.

component.name: customers.experiments.listExperimentAsyncErrors
component.description: Returns all errors that occurred during the last Experiment update (either scheduling or promotion). Supports standard list paging.

component.name: customers.experiments.mutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes experiments. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: customers.experiments.promoteExperiment
component.description: Promotes the trial campaign thus applying changes in the trial campaign to the base campaign. This method returns a long running operation that tracks the promotion of the experiment campaign. If it fails, a list of errors can be retrieved using the experiments.listExperimentAsyncErrors method. The operation's metadata will be a string containing the resource name of the created experiment.

component.name: customers.experiments.scheduleExperiment
component.description: Schedule an experiment. The in design campaign will be converted into a real campaign (called the experiment campaign) that will begin serving ads if successfully created.

component.name: customers.extensionFeedItems.mutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes extension feed items. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: customers.generateAdGroupThemes
component.description: Returns a list of suggested AdGroups and suggested modifications (text, match type) for the given keywords.

component.name: customers.generateAudienceCompositionInsights
component.description: Returns a collection of attributes that are represented in an audience of interest, with metrics that compare each attribute's share of the audience with its share of a baseline audience.

component.name: customers.generateAudienceOverlapInsights
component.description: Returns a collection of audience attributes along with estimates of the overlap between their potential YouTube reach and that of a given input attribute.

component.name: customers.generateInsightsFinderReport
component.description: Creates a saved report that can be viewed in the Insights Finder tool.

component.name: customers.generateKeywordForecastMetrics
component.description: Returns metrics (such as impressions, clicks, total cost) of a keyword forecast for the given campaign.

component.name: customers.generateKeywordHistoricalMetrics
component.description: Returns a list of keyword historical metrics.

component.name: customers.generateKeywordIdeas
component.description: Returns a list of keyword ideas.

component.name: customers.generateReachForecast
component.description: Generates a reach forecast for a given targeting / product mix.

component.name: customers.generateShareablePreviews
component.description: Returns the requested Shareable Preview.

component.name: customers.generateSuggestedTargetingInsights
component.description: Returns a collection of targeting insights (e.g. targetable audiences) that are relevant to the requested audience.

component.name: customers.getIdentityVerification
component.description: Returns Identity Verification information.

component.name: customers.googleAds.mutate
component.description: Creates, updates, or removes resources. This method supports atomic transactions with multiple types of resources. For example, you can atomically create a campaign and a campaign budget, or perform up to thousands of mutates atomically.

component.name: customers.googleAds.search
component.description: Returns all rows that match the search query.

component.name: customers.googleAds.searchStream
component.description: Returns all rows that match the search stream query.

component.name: customers.invoices.list
component.description: Returns all invoices associated with a billing setup, for a given month.

component.name: customers.mutate
component.description: Updates a customer. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: customers.offlineUserDataJobs.addOperations
component.description: Adds operations to the offline user data job.

component.name: customers.offlineUserDataJobs.create
component.description: Creates an offline user data job.

component.name: customers.offlineUserDataJobs.run
component.description: Runs the offline user data job.

component.name: customers.operations.cancel
component.description: Starts asynchronous cancellation on a long-running operation. The server makes a best effort to cancel the operation, but success is not guaranteed. If the server doesn't support this method, it returnsgoogle.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED. Clients can useOperations.GetOperationor other methods to check whether the cancellation succeeded or whether the operation completed despite cancellation. On successful cancellation, the operation is not deleted; instead, it becomes an operation with anOperation.errorvalue with agoogle.rpc.Status.codeof 1, corresponding toCode.CANCELLED.

component.name: customers.operations.get
component.description: Gets the latest state of a long-running operation. Clients can use this method to poll the operation result at intervals as recommended by the API service.

component.name: customers.operations.list
component.description: Lists operations that match the specified filter in the request. If the server doesn't support this method, it returnsUNIMPLEMENTED.

component.name: customers.operations.wait
component.description: Waits until the specified long-running operation is done or reaches at most a specified timeout, returning the latest state. If the operation is already done, the latest state is immediately returned. If the timeout specified is greater than the default HTTP/RPC timeout, the HTTP/RPC timeout is used. If the server does not support this method, it returnsgoogle.rpc.Code.UNIMPLEMENTED. Note that this method is on a best-effort basis. It may return the latest state before the specified timeout (including immediately), meaning even an immediate response is no guarantee that the operation is done.

component.name: customers.paymentsAccounts.list
component.description: Returns all payments accounts associated with all managers between the login customer ID and specified serving customer in the hierarchy, inclusive.

component.description: Creates a product link invitation.

component.name: customers.productLinkInvitations.remove
component.description: Remove a product link invitation.

component.name: customers.productLinkInvitations.update

component.name: customers.productLinks.remove

component.name: customers.recommendations.dismiss
component.description: Dismisses given recommendations.

component.name: customers.recommendations.generate
component.description: Generates Recommendations based off the requested recommendationTypes.

component.description: Suggests a Smart campaign ad compatible with the Ad family of resources, based on data points such as targeting and the business to advertise.

component.name: customers.suggestSmartCampaignBudgetOptions

component.name: customers.suggestTravelAssets
component.description: Returns Travel Asset suggestions. Asset suggestions are returned on a best-effort basis. There are no guarantees that all possible asset types will be returned for any given hotel property.

component.description: Regenerate ThirdPartyAppAnalyticsLink.shareable_link_id that should be provided to the third party when setting up app analytics.

component.name: customers.userLists.mutate
component.description: Creates or updates user lists. Operation statuses are returned.

component.name: geoTargetConstants.suggest
component.description: Returns GeoTargetConstant suggestions by location name or by resource name.

component.name: googleAdsFields.get
component.description: Returns just the requested field.

component.name: googleAdsFields.search
component.description: Returns all fields that match the search query.

component.name: keywordThemeConstants.suggest
component.description: Returns KeywordThemeConstant suggestions by keyword themes.

component.name: listPlannableLocations
component.description: Returns the list of plannable locations (for example, countries).

component.name: listPlannableProducts
component.description: Returns the list of per-location plannable YouTube ad formats with allowed targeting.
